Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: WB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are rrtd in both directions via Division, Pulaski, Grand, then resume their normal route on Division due to street blockage nr Division/Hamlin

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Pulaski, Grand, then resume their normal route on Division due to street blockage near Division/Hamlin.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute near 130th/Vernon
ShortDescription: 34 So Mchgn buses rrtd SB via Mchgn,115th, Bishop Ford E-way, 115th & Mchgn; NB via 130th, Bishop Ford Expressway, 115th & Mchgn due to blockage nr 130th/Vernon

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 130th/Vernon.

  • Southbound buses will operate via Michigan,115th, Bishop Ford Expressway, 115th and Michigan.
  • Northbound buses will operate via 130th, Bishop Ford Expressway, 115th and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
